display.title: Wisdom of Huu
description: Signified by patches of land and green water, §2Swamps§r are home to §aFrogs§r, §cSlimes§r, and §3Lily Pads§r.
§3Lily Pads§r can be §dplaced on water§r, and are solid - they can be used to make §dthin decorative water bridges§r.
§cSlimes§r can spawn in swamps at night when the §dmoon is visible§r - most commonly during a full moon.
Orange §aTemperate Frogs§r will produce §eOchre Froglights§r when swallowing small §cMagma Cubes§r.
§7[Carpet]§r Lily Pads are §drenewable§r through using §3Bone Meal§r.
